page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE ON A LOCAL FARM
page.content: The day starts at 06.30.Cooker to fuel then outside to feed the calves,hens and ducks.Back into house to prepare breakfast.Children to get ready for school.Leave by car at 08.30.On returning home it is the usual routine beds to make,dishes to wash.On Monday a big wash day.Thursday baking day.Friday deliver eggs to customers and buy the weekly shpoping.Other days on call to help with cattle or sheep and occasionally,to drive a tractor. Dinner at 12.30.Back to school for children at 15.30.Have family tea. Calves,ducks and hens to feed.Supervise any homework. Evening meal to prepare then wash-up, mending and ironing to do. Shut the hens and ducks in.Watch news at nine on telwvision.Then to bed.
